name: Zabbix active
description: Zabbix agent ask from server, what data it need and then send this data to server

pollingFreq.description: Polling frequency for item in seconds

throttlingMaxSkippingValues.description: Number of values that can be skipped (throttling)

throttlingMaxTimeInterval.description: Time interval when values can be skipped (throttling)

throttlingDeviation.description: Values deviation for skip 0-100%. 0 - values must be equal (throttling)
